remarks: The inner product function on a normed complex vector space.  The definition is meaningful for vector spaces that are also inner product spaces, i.e. satisfy the parallelogram law.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

dipfval.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.

$d N k x y $.
